<h4> 
A former police officer and University of Chicago Graduate Student, I combine my 2 years of law enforcement experience with my education in social science to apply data driven, evidence based methodology to US public safety.**

When I'm not coding or creating visualizations, you'll find me in my kitchen cooking anything I can get my hands on, biking [The 606](https://www.the606.org/visit/maps/map/), or at a local brewery!**

Please use the *Reach Me* links above to contact me via social media outlets. You can also see my code and projects I've worked on in the [*Projects*](projects.html) section.**

<h4/>
